entry.value: WITH CTE AS ( SELECT account_debit_id AS Account_ID, SUM(POSTING_AMT) AS debit FROM TABLE_TRANSACT$ GROUP BY account_debit_id ), CTE_1 AS ( SELECT account_credit_id AS Account_ID, SUM(POSTING_AMT) AS credit FROM TABLE_TRANSACT$ GROUP BY account_credit_id ) SELECT Account_ID, CURRENT_DATE AS Current_Date, credit - debit AS Account_Balance FROM CTE INNER JOIN CTE_1 USING(Account_ID) ORDER BY Account_ID
